ModMetaData.name: GoW Weapon Pack
ModMetaData.author: AHumanHat
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Team[/h1] Coding - Flake (Me) Art - ShotgunFrenzy
For a long time, Gears of War has been my favorite game franchise. I've spent countless hours on it, and I figured it was time to pay homage to it!
That said, I present to you, the Gears of War Weapon Pack!
[h1]Overview[/h1] This mod adds 8 weapons from the Gears franchise! All of the weapons come with 256x256 sprites and custom sounds directly from the games!
[h1]The Armory[/h1] [list] [*]Lancer Rifle [*]Retro Lancer Rifle [*]Hammerburst MKI [*]Hammerburst MKII [*]Gnasher Shotgun [*]Boomshot [*]Dropshot [*]Longshot [*]Breechshot [*]Tri-shot [*]Buzzkill [*]Boltok Pistol [*]Snub Pistol [/list]
